title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example are enabled, but they do not have any effect. This is misleading, especially when opening a small image like an icon.
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2 and KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled and movable but do not have any effect.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled when opening a small image like an icon.
SR:
1. Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2 and KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only)
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example
3. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and moveable
4. Observe that the scrollbars do not have any effect
5. Open a small image, like an icon
6. Observe that the scrollbars are just misleading because they do not do anything
